meanings.definition: Capable of being attributed or credited to a particular cause or source.
meanings.sent1: The success of the project was ascribable to the hard work of the team.
meanings.sent2: The improvement in sales was ascribable to the new marketing strategy.
meanings.sent3: The delicious aroma in the kitchen was ascribable to the freshly baked cookies.
meanings.sent4: Her radiant smile was ascribable to the joy in her heart.
meanings.sent5: The sudden burst of laughter was ascribable to the comedian's witty joke.

meanings.definition: Capable of being assigned or imputed to a particular person or group.
meanings.sent1: The mysterious note left on the desk was ascribable to the mischievous student.
meanings.sent2: The beautiful painting was ascribable to the talented artist.
meanings.sent3: The loud music from the party was ascribable to the enthusiastic DJ.
meanings.sent4: The intricate design of the dress was ascribable to the skilled fashion designer.
meanings.sent5: The peaceful atmosphere in the garden was ascribable to the diligent gardener.
